topics.author: 4fdef063945b700a9d01604f

topics.body: For the first time we have risen, and I see we are being consumed. I see circles that are not circles. Billions of dead souls inside containment. Unravellers have eaten country's moral fabric, turning hearts into filth. I'm from a kingdom level above human. What does that yield? A hokey smile that damns an entire nation. There is no hope.
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a

topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551178a56368724e09b92800#post_551178a56368724e09b92800
Alright, I'm gonna say lore stuff too.

_"From the days of old, kings have struck man to their knees. It was the law of which all beings, mortal or god, that is followed. Stone slabs had been brought from mountains of afar, each man would carry one on their backs as it was their king's word. It would crack their bones and spill their blood, but soon it would be done. Pools of molten metal cover the city walls, making a fortress that even gods shall fear._

_This was man's blood and steel. This was the Citadel."_

I was actually going to say stuff about space monkeys but this seemed appropriate.
